Please fill in as much as you can — the more detail, the faster we can reproduce and fix issues.

- Node version:
- npm / pnpm / yarn:
- Next.js version:
- OS / Browser:

### Which kit(s) did you install?
(e.g., blocks, auth, forms, data)

### Steps to reproduce
1. (Command you ran)
2. (Files you changed)
3. (Any post-install steps you followed — e.g. `cp .env.example .env`, `npx prisma migrate dev -n init`)
4. Visit: (URL / route)

### Observed
(What happened? Error messages, behaviour, etc.)

### Expected
(What you expected to happen)

### Logs / Network / Responses
- Server console (paste relevant lines)
- Network response / HTTP payload (paste relevant response bodies)
- Browser console errors (if any)

### Minimal reproduction branch / snippet
(If possible, link to a small repo/branch or paste the smallest code snippet that reproduces the issue.)

### Screenshots / Recordings
(Attach images or a short screen recording if helpful)

### Optional: Temporary workarounds you tried
(Anything you tried that changed the outcome)

If this is general feedback (not a bug), please describe the UX or wording you’d change and why. Thank you — your notes help shape the project!
